name: INStartWorkoutIntentHandling
desc: An interface that handles requests to start a workout.

items.name: func resolveWorkoutName(for: INStartWorkoutIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the workout name selected by the user.

items.name: func resolveGoalValue(for: INStartWorkoutIntent, with: (INDoubleResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the numerical goal of a user’s workout.

items.name: func resolveWorkoutGoalUnitType(for: INStartWorkoutIntent, with: (INWorkoutGoalUnitTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the units for the user’s workout goal.

items.name: func resolveWorkoutLocationType(for: INStartWorkoutIntent, with: (INWorkoutLocationTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the location type of a user’s workout.

items.name: func resolveIsOpenEnded(for: INStartWorkoutIntent, with: (INBooleanResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves whether the user’s workout is open ended.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INStartWorkoutIntent, completion: (INStartWorkoutIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Validates that your app is able to start the workout.
